title: AI Engineer
text: Design and implement machine learning models and AI systems. Work with neural networks, NLP, and computer vision. Requires Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch experience.

title: Game Developer
text: Create video games using game engines like Unity or Unreal. Design gameplay mechanics, implement graphics, and optimize performance. Knowledge of C++ or C# required.

title: Data Scientist
text: Analyze large datasets to extract insights and build predictive models. Use statistical methods and machine learning. Requires Python, SQL, and statistics knowledge.

title: Full Stack Developer
text: Build web applications from frontend to backend. Work with React, Node.js, databases. Create responsive UIs and RESTful APIs.

title: DevOps Engineer
text: Manage cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines. Automate deployments using Docker, Kubernetes. Monitor system performance and reliability.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
text: Protect systems from cyber threats. Conduct security audits, monitor for breaches, implement security protocols. Knowledge of networking and security tools required.

title: Mobile App Developer
text: Build iOS and Android applications. Use Swift, Kotlin, or cross-platform frameworks like Flutter or React Native. Focus on user experience and performance.

title: Cloud Architect
text: Design cloud-based solutions on AWS, GCP, or Azure. Plan infrastructure, optimize costs, ensure scalability and security.

title: UX Designer
text: Create user-centered designs for digital products. Conduct user research, create wireframes and prototypes. Work with Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD.

title: Product Manager
text: Define product vision and roadmap. Work with engineering and design teams. Prioritize features based on user needs and business goals.

title: MLOps Engineer
text: Deploy and maintain machine learning models in production. Build ML pipelines, monitor model performance, manage model versioning.

title: Blockchain Developer
text: Build decentralized applications and smart contracts. Work with Ethereum, Solidity, Web3. Understand cryptography and distributed systems.

title: QA Engineer
text: Ensure software quality through testing. Write automated tests, perform manual testing, track bugs. Use Selenium, Jest, or similar tools.

title: Technical Writer
text: Create documentation for software products. Write user guides, API documentation, tutorials. Translate technical concepts for various audiences.

title: Robotics Engineer
text: Design and program robots and autonomous systems. Work with sensors, actuators, and control systems. Knowledge of ROS and embedded systems.
